ing: 1/2 fluid ounce white creme de menthe
des: "There's no sting a cocktail made from crÃ¨me de menthe and brandy can't heal. Shake up one of these classic cocktails before or after dinner."
ins: Combine brandy and creme de menthe in a cocktail shaker. Add ice; cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
